name: VREscalate
description:
My first 3D platformer type game using VR. This will definitely challenge your fear of heights.  I focused on escalate and quick as key game elements. Try to make it to level 12 and then hang on.  

Gameplay Instructions

Left touch pad to move.  Click touch pad to jump.
Left or right trigger to press a button or grab.
Right touch pad to turn.

Use the elevator to get back to a level you have already reached

Content Creation

Custom VR pawn movement and all mechanics developed during 5 days; actually 3 days. This wasn't my first idea, but it took 2 days before I abandoned the first.

Hand from IBFPS Hands asset pack
Music from Fantasy Music Pack 3, Game Music Mega Pack, Tree of Life market place assets

Mines / buttons, explosion and textures from Epic free content

If you like this game, leave a comment.
